definition: (of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa

sentences.english: J. Simpson's codefendants were in a Las Vegas court today.
sentences.chinese: 辛普森的共同被告今日走上拉斯維加斯法庭。

sentences.english: Jury selection begins today in O. J. Simpson's latest trial.
sentences.chinese: 今天開始挑選辛普森一案最新審判中的陪審團成員。

sentences.english: Mrs. Simpson put her soup on the stove.
sentences.chinese: 辛普森太太將湯放到爐子上。

sentences.english: It's a similar story at Simpson Marine, a Hong Kong-based broker that also has offices in China.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，香港辛普森遊艇代理在中國大陸也設有辦公室。

sentences.english: Regulators dozing Homer Simpson-like at the switch?
sentences.chinese: 難道是監管者像荷馬。辛普森那樣玩忽職守？

sentences.english: This song was requested by Mrs Simpson of Potters Bar.
sentences.chinese: 這首歌是波特斯巴的辛普森夫人點播的。

sentences.english: O. J. Simpson is putting out a new book called "If I Did It".
sentences.chinese: 辛普森出了一本名爲“如果是我乾的”的新書。

sentences.english: Mr Sympson proved to be a man of spotless respectability.
sentences.chinese: 辛普森先生原來就是一位無懈可擊的體面人物。

sentences.english: Two of O. J. Simpson's codefendants were in a Las Vegas court today.
sentences.chinese: 辛普森的共同被告今日走上拉斯維加斯法庭。

sentences.english: For example some of the clips were from the comedy shows The Simpsons and Seinfeld.
sentences.chinese: 一些短片是來自喜劇“辛普森一家與塞恩菲爾德”。

sentences.english: The Simpson sisters have been very vocal lately when it comes to snubs against their family.
sentences.chinese: 辛普森姐妹都非常聲最近當談到怠慢對他們的家庭。

sentences.english: Mrs. Simpson gave him the first dish.
sentences.chinese: 辛普森太太第一個將湯分給了他。

sentences.english: After reuniting, Jobs and Simpson developed a close relationship.
sentences.chinese: 在兄妹相認後，喬布斯和辛普森關係逐漸密切。

sentences.english: In a highly controversial verdict, the jury acquitted Simpson.
sentences.chinese: 陪審團最後對辛普森做出了極具爭議的無罪判決。

sentences.english: She is the wife of Simpson, the America's longest-running prime time TV show.
sentences.chinese: 她是美國最長的電視連續劇《辛普森家族》中的妻子。

sentences.english: Mrs. Simpson made the best soup in town.
sentences.chinese: 辛普森太太做的湯在小鎮裏是最好的。

definition: Rice (name)/Condoleezza Rice (1954-) US Secretary of State 2005-2009
Kennedy (name)/J.F. Kennedy (1917-1963), US Democrat politician, president 1961-1963
Foster or Forster (name)/Stephen Collins Foster (1826-1864), American composer
